title: How is alistar at jungling?
body: In season 5. (Which is the current season I believe. Sorry, i'm fairly new)

replies.body: He is ok. Not bad, not great.

Level 2 gank is amazing, mediocre clear, post-6 can force tower dives on ganks.

My one thought is his dueling potential depends on who his fighting in the jungle, anyone that can jump onto him after his knockback can probably fight him with ease before 6, but this requires the Alistar using said knockback without them wasting their gap close.

Probably a decent tank jungler, but you'd have to rely mostly on your laners to actually provide the damage (not always the best).

Not as good as he used to be. His passive used to deal 200% (double) damage to minions and monsters (or just monsters, I can't remember which one)

He's still fine now, but there are so many other better choices unfortunately.

He can clear the whole jungle

I've tried him out along with a bunch of other people
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/IrXAdm8b-champions-that-can-clear-the-jungle?show=flat
Thanks for all the comments so far! If anyone else has anything to say, go for it :)
